author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3255: client capabilities were not passed to start-commit
Without this fix, start-commit cannot do early rejection of
commits from clients that do not support mergeinfo.
r32538 removes duplicated headers from the neon capablity exchange request.

author: kfogel
msg: * STATUS: Add my vote for r32538, completing the group.

author: joeswatosh
